1.content:
You were walking home from school one day, when you tripped over something. You looked down, and saw what looked like the Triforce.

"What the-" You wonder. You take it home to study it, but eventually fall asleep, with the Triforce looking thing beside you.

In the morning, you wake up and get ready for school, then you see the Triforce looking thing on your bed.

"So it wasn't a dream." You say as you rub your eyes. "Wouldn't it be funny if this gave me a wish like the Triforce does." You say with a chuckle as you look over to your games. "I know what I'd want... To be a character in the Legend of Zelda series!" The Triforce imitation glows for a second, before becoming a ball of light, and then entering your body.
1.title: Beginning

11.content: Which Link will it be?
11.title: One of the many Links

But you felt a strange feeling in your stomach. You said "Wow! I must be really hungry!" Then, you feel the feeling in your stomach intensify, and you collapse onto the kitchen floor due to the sharp pains of your stomach. "I don't think this is hunger!" You barely make out before passing out. When you come to, you feel strange. The first difference that you notice is

You look closer in the mirror, and notice that
11511.title: You are a lot smaller

1213.content:
"Well, that was strange." You say after the Triforce thingy disappears inside of you. "All well, might as well start the day." You say as you head towards the door. Along the way, you pass by a mirror in your room. You do a double take and head back to it and see something strange. "What is this?!" You wonder out loud. Normally, you are a 16-year old boy. However, you see in the mirror what looks like an 11-year old version of yourself. You pose a bit in the mirror and, to your horror, the image in the mirror does the same. 'How did I suddenly turn 11 again? Maybe I'm dreaming.' You think. Thankfully, it seems that your clothes that you are wearing shrank with you.

What do you do next?
1213.title: Age

12133.content: Are your parents or sister home right now?
12133.title: Is your family home right now?

121332.content:
You got up pretty late, around 10:30 am, so your parents are at work and your sister is spending the day at a friend of hers. Forgetting what you wished for earlier, you shake off the fact that you are eleven again and go get some breakfast. "I'm sure that there is a perfectly reasonable explanation for this." You say although you aren't completely sure yourself.

You head to the kitchen, still in your pajamas, and make yourself some breakfast. You fix yourself a bagel with some milk and sit down in the dining room.

Does anything change during this?
121332.title: breakfast time

12133211.content:
You sit down in the dining room, eating your breakfast. "Wow, I never noticed how quiet it is in here when no one else is here" you say. Suddenly, you are overcome with discomfort practically all over your body. "Owwwww! What the heck?!" you say out loud. The discomfort is so bad that you don't notice what is happening. Slowly but surely, your body starts to shrink. Your shoulders become smaller and rounder as you grow thinner. Your arms and legs lose their muscle, become thin. Your hands and feet become petite and dainty. Your chest also loses muscle and becomes smooth. After it finishes, you have the body build of an 11-year old girl.

Eventually, the pain subsides, leaving you a little winded. "Phew, that was not fun" you say out loud, not noticing your new body.

What's next?
12133211.title: build changes

121332111.content:
It wasn't too long before another wave of discomfort came over you. This time, it was centered around your groin. The pain caused you to collapse to the ground. Under your clothes, your anatomy began to change. Your penis slowly shrank, going inside your body. The balls became a pair of ovaries and a womb developed behind them. Where your 'manhood' used to be was now just a slit, indicating a female vagina.

After the pain went away, you looked under your underwear to confirm what happened. "Well, it's official, I'm becoming a girl, but who?" you ask, forgetting what happened earlier.

What's next?
121332111.title: gender changes

choices: head up to the bathroom (face and voice)

The next change soon began. However, considering that you were now 11-years old, it wasn't as drastic as it would have been if you were older. Your hips and butt slightly increased in size, a size fitting your age. It certainly foreshadowed something wonderful in the future. Then, your stomach tucked itself in and became firm and your waist constricted a bit. Then, small A-cup breasts swelled up on your chest.

You had already figured out that you were becoming a girl so this was no surprise.

Now what?

12133211121.content:
"I better get to a bathroom so I can actually see who I'm becoming" you say as you run up the stairs to the bathroom. You close the door behind you and look at the mirror, just in time for the next changes.

This time, you felt a sensation on your face. Your face was changing. "Now I'll know" you say as some discomfort comes on your face. Your bones slightly reform as your jawline becomes smaller. Then, you saw your lips slightly fill and your cheeks became a little more defined. Your brown eyes became blue and your eyebrows thinned. Then, you saw as your ears greatly changed, becoming long and pointy. Then, the face comepletely reshaped, becoming something you recognized. "Zelda! I'm becoming Zelda!" you say. At that, your hands grab your throat. That wasn't your voice. It has high and feminine.

Now, there was one thing left.
12133211121.title: head up to the bathroom (face and voice)

All that was left was the hair. Soon, you felt an itchiness on your head. You watched as your short hair grew longer and longer, reaching down to just past the shoulders. After it finished growing, it faded to a bright blonde color, as did any other hair on your body. With that, your body was completely changed. You were shocked that that Triforce thing actually worked!

Now, it was time for the clothes.
121332111211.title: Hair changes

1213321112111.content:
Suddenly, you felt shifting under your clothes. You first looked under your pants to see your blue boxers changing. The boxers shrank, hugging your body. As they did, the leggings started to rise up your legs, eventually, exposing your whole leg. Then, the opening in the front closed and a bow appeared as well as appearing on the sides. Then, the material changed to a silky material s it faded to a light pink. Just like that, your boxers were now a pair of light pink panties.

Then, it continued to your white undershirt. Like the panties, it shrank to hug your body, slightly causing discomfort for your new budding breasts. Then, the hemline of the shirt started to rise up your body, ending just under the breasts. A couple of cups formed around your buds. Then, the neckline and armholes of the shirt expanded, creating a pair of straps going over your shoulders and one going around your back. Last, the color faded from white to light pink. Now, you sported a matching light pink bra.

What's next?
1213321112111.title: underwear

12133211121111.content:
Suddenly, you felt more shifting on your torso. At first, you couldn't see anything but then you looked under your shirt. Something else was forming on you. On top of your new chest, some light blue material was forming on your body. Soon enough, it covered your whole torso and started to cover your arms. It went down to your wrists and, at first, resembled a long-sleeved shirt. But then, the sleeves puff up from your shoulders to your elbows, now looking like the top half of a dress. The material felt silky.

It wasn't over though. You then started to feel your jeans shifting. First, they faded from dark blue to the same light blue as the top. Then, a couple of rips appeared on the insides of the leggings and they merged together, forming some kind of long jean skirt. Then, it extended slightly, going down all the way to the ground, covering your feet. Then, the material changed to the same silk as the top. Finally, the top and skirt merged together and hugged your body, forming a light blue dress.

What's next?
12133211121111.title: Underdress

121332111211111.content:
It wasn't too long before the next change occured. This time, you felt yet another material forming on your torso. Looking down, you see some kind of light purple material forming on top of your new dress. Like the other clothes, it felt silky. The material completely covered your torso, forming short sleeves on your arms and closing closer around your neck than the light blue dress underneath. A purple ring formed on the edge of each short sleeve. Then, the hemline continued downwards, going around your curves and all the way down to the ground, completely covering the light blue dress.

"Gosh, how can she move with so much clothing?" you wonder out loud.

What's next?
121332111211111.title: next dress

1213321112111111.content:
Yet, once again, another top began to form on you. This time, it was purple in color but the same silk as the others. Like the others, this one covered your torso but this one did not have sleeves. Also, it had a wide neckline. Basically, it was made so, if this was the only top you were wearing, it would barely cover your breasts. Then, it continued on to your lower body, but this one was different. This one split on the sides and only went down to a little past your knees. The bottom curved into a triangle shape at the bottom. Then, the Hylian Chrest, with the eagle-like thing and the triforce above it and the golden triangle underneath it, appeared under your waist. With that, you knew that the dress was finally completed.

What's next?
1213321112111111.title: the last top

12133211121111111.content:
Next, you felt Zelda's accesories decorate themselves on you. A couple of gold bracelets appeared on your wrists, holding the sleeves of the light blue dress in place. Then, a gold belt with a huge gold ball in the middle formed around your waist, holding all 3 tops in place. Then, a gold necklace with a red stone in the center formed around your neck.

What's next?
12133211121111111.title: jewelry appears

You next felt shifting around your feet. Pulling up your long dress, you see your socks and shoes changing. You socks shrank and completely disappeared. Then, your shoeleaces disappeared and the tongue fused into the rest of the shoe. Then, it shrank to hug your feet. After that, the tops of the shoes began to widen, exposing the tops of your feet. Then, the normally black shoes faded to a purple color. To finish it off, a small heel formed in the back. Your black shoes were now purple small-heeled shoes. The heels, for a second, caused you to lose your balance but you quickly regained it.

There was only one thing left now.

The only thing left was Zelda's headwear. Suddenly, you felt new material around your head. Then, as if by magic, your shoulder-length blonde hair, moved on its own. It compressed itself on the top of your head as a white-purple material formed over it. Right now, it looked like a snowcap. A wide purple line formed around the hemline of the cap. Then, in the center, a circular piece with the Triforce symbol on it, formed, connecting some kind of purple material. Then, some white-purple cloth extended from the back of the headdress, going straight down and stopping at your neck. Then, a couple of purple and blue lines formed around the bottom of it. With that, the headdress was completed.

Now, you had Zelda's complete body and clothing. "This is unreal" you say outloud, partially worried and partially excited at the same time.

What happens next?
1213321112111111111.title: the headdress

Dresses, dresses, dresses. Everything in the house was dresses! He'd tried his brother's room, his dad's room, even his mother and sister's rooms, but in each of them, every single scrap of clothing had been miraculously converted into a Princess' wardrobe. There wasn't an inch of fabric that wasn't white, pink, purple, frilly, or laced in some way.

He needed to-
122111.title: Dresses, dresses everywhere & not a stitch to wear

1221111.content:
The mailman was posting letters through the door when it swung open, and he found himself face-to-waist with a naked man. Anthony recoiled in surprise. The mailman, because he was a professional, simply straightened up and said, "You're naked."

"I need clothes," Anthony said desperately.

The mailman nodded. "My thoughts exactly." He removed his hat and offered it to the young man. "Party, was it?"

"Magic." Anthony replied, grabbing the wide, blue mailman hat and holding it over his groin area.

Stan the Mailman liked to think he'd seen it all in his twenty years of service. But when his hat jumped out of Anthony's hand, wrapped itself around the boy's waist, and rapidly transformed into a pair of white women's briefs, he was genuinely surprised. For a few seconds anyway.

"You owe me a new hat." He said sharply.

Anthony-

After Stan left, Anthony began to run until he reached the mall... trying to avoid every face. He entered the first shop he saw, grabbed some pants and a shirt, and then entered a fitting room. After he put the clothes on, everything was normal, until the shirt and pants reshaped and formed a new dress

"Dammit! What kind of curse was bestowed on me?" He wondered out loud. He left the dress behind, and when Anthony came out, he saw that every piece of clothing at the store was a dress! "What gives? Maybe no one will notice I'm wearing it."

You tip the toothbrushes out of the toothbrush holder, fill it with water, and drink it down. It barely even starts to quench your thirst, so you stick your mouth under the tap and leave it running.

Anybody watching you would probably find it funny: you almost seem to be swelling up with the amount of water that you're drinking. As you drink, your hips and chest expand like water balloons, and the more you drink the larger they get.

13213.content:
The bathroom tap refuses to turn off. You know you have more important matters to deal with, but soon the basin is overflowing with water and no matter how you wrestle with the tap the flow of water keeps getting stronger and stronger. Soon there's a waterfall of water streaming onto the bathroom floor. You slam the door to stop it flooding through into your bedroom.

Very soon you're up to your ankles in water. As you rummage through the plumbing beneath your sink, trying to turn off the water at it's source, you fail to notice that the bathroom tiles seem to be merging together and that the bathroom around you is growing larger, more cavernous.

"TURN OFF!" You yell, wrapping your blue scaled hands around the cold-water pipe and yanking. It breaks, releasing a massive torrent of water that knocks you backwards. You're momentarily submerged. When you surface -
13213.title: Water pallava

132132.content:
When you surface, you can't believe your eyes. The bathroom has given way to the entirety of Zora's domain... the waterfall, the tunnels leading to various areas, it's all just like you remember it. It's breath taking, but not quite as breath taking as...

You look down and notice your body. Gone are your clothes, replaced with blue scales. Two breasts sit beautifully on your chest. You would have loved this if it wasn't possibly permanent. Although you are worried and wanted to be you again, you are curious, so you reach down and touch your new breasts. You no longer have nipples, but they are still sensitive to the touch. You massage them, making them feel wonderful.

It's incredible how smooth your skin is under water, it's even finer than silk. You feel your skin all over, trying to get use to the curves you now possess. You submerge into the water, and you have to admit you enjoy the feeling of your skin while underwater.

You expect to be gasping for breath, but strangely, you feel at ease in the water. Heck, it's easier to breath in the water than it is on land.

'This makes sense, come to think of it.' You think as you realize how easy it is to breath under water. 'I am a Zora now, after all.' It's still a strange experience though, flourishing where you would normally be restricted.

You start to explore your body in order to get some good out of this, so you begin to massage and caress your new body. Your hand wanders downward and meets your new crotch. The lack of a penis startles you, but considering you're breathing underwater, it doesn't surprise you as much as you'd think. The feeling emitted from massaging your new pussy is fantastic, though, especially under water... with one hand on your breast and the other on your privates, you explore yourself fully, enjoying the beautiful feeling produced from it. And the crazy thing is, the feeling just builds and builds... it keeps feeling better and better, taking you on a roller coaster ride of pure bliss...

Then, you orgasm. And what a great release it is... you float in the water for awhile, a knowing smile sits on your face. You were definitely looking forward to doing that again, but first you had to find out if there is a way to change back.
132132.title: Your bathroom=Zora's Domain

1321322.content:
You sense a disturbance in the water around you with your sensitive skin and suddenly in a spray of water, a Zora surfaces in the water beside you. It's a male... you think. You really hope he didn't see you. He appears breathless, gasping for air, his gills frilling in and out.

"Princess, you must come with me!" he gasps.

"What? Why?"

He glares with barely tempered anger. You expect that, if you weren't a member of their royalty, he would just have dragged you away.

"Do you not remember? - "
1321322.title: A Zora approaches you

13213222.title: Wedding with Link

132132221.content:
"Today is the day of your wedding to Link, the Hero of Time." The male Zora reminds you.

"But he's a man!" You yell, horrified. The Zora looks at your curiously. "I mean... he's a human!" You look at yourself. "And I'm a fish! ... there are so many things wrong with this..."

141.content:
Suddenly, thick brown hair courses down your back. You cry out in alarm and twist around, grabbing at the hair with both hands and yanking. It feels real enough. A tight ribbon fastens itself near your scalp, pulling the hair back into a long ponytail. You can feel the end tickling your calves.

What changes next?
141.title: Hair

1412.content:
You feel a sudden jolt. Panicking, you lean out the window, thinking it might be an earthquake. Just then, another jolt knocks you to the ground.

You stand up and realize you've shrunk dramatically - you only just reach the top of your drawers, which are about four feet high. Running to the mirror, you trip over your long hair. Cursing, you check your reflection. Your face is much more rounded and childlike, the messy brown hair spilling over your forehead. You pretty much look like a young girl. This makes you worry.

What changes now?
1412.title: Body

14121.content: As you're looking in the mirror you suddenly see your now oversized clothing shifting. In disbelief you look down, and back up at the mirror and see your pants and shirt merge to form a long blue robe that reaches your knees. Your shoes and socks seem to fade away, leaving nothing but small girlish feet, then a small metalic hoop then forms around your head. The last thing you notice change is at the neck of the robe changing from blue to white poofs out a bit, forming an almost scarf-like collar.
14121.title: Clothes

141211.content:
You try to walk closer to the mirror, but your feet tense up against your will. You look down to see them shrink a little and some of your toes disappear. Moments later you have a pair of birdlike feet with small talons. Not knowing how to balance on them, you fall over backwards.

Before you can try to get up again, you feel a sharp pain in your nose, which seems to widen and stiffen. Your nostrils seal up, only to reappear above where they were. At the same time you feel an itching in your eyes, a stretching sensation in your ears and a slight tingling all over your body.

You grab hold of the bed - it looks so big now - and carefully pull yourself up onto your new feet. Stumbling towards the mirror, you let out a surprisingly high-pitched gasp when you see your face. Your nose has taken on a beak-like appearance, your eyes are a bright red, your ears have grown long and pointed, and your skin is now a pale greyish colour. You wonder if anything else is going to happen.
141211.title: The Medli Maker

choices: Look for a way to change back
1412111.content:
Just when you think it's over, you feel a pressure building around your shoulders, as if something is piling up on them. It quickly stops, and you wonder what happened. Whatever just materialised on you isn't visible in the mirror, but you know it's there. You can feel it bunched up between your skin and your clothes.

The discomfort leads to to raise your arms upward - which causes a pair of wings to erupt out of your sleeves, enveloping your arms. Holding that pose, you stare at your reflection. You really look like a bird now. You hope this is as far as the transformation goes - you wouldn't much like to be a pigeon. You also hope you can retract these things.

After some struggling to move your arms vertically, you manage to find the position that allows you to lower them and make the wings retreat back to where they came from. All this movement makes you realise that your body feels very light, even considering that you've lost a lot of your height. You look down at your avian feet and muse that they probably wouldn't support the weight of a human.

You clamber up onto the bed - being careful not to raise your arms too high - and sit down. You move your limbs around in various ways, getting a feel for your new body while making frequent, uneasy glances into the mirror. You keep expecting something else to happen, but after several minutes you conclude that your changes are over.

What are you going to do now, though? You're a freak, and no-one will even recognise you!
1412111.title: You gain wings

choices: Try to land in the street
Keep going until you reach somewhere with more space
14121112.content:
Were this a dream, the logical conclusion would be for you to fly. You don't think this is a dream - you've felt too much pain for that - but being at a loss for other courses of action, you find yourself deciding to try it anyway. Should you fail, well, maybe you wouldn't mind falling so much if your situation doesn't even have that upside.

You walk across the bed to your window open it, and are surprised to be met with a blast of wind. You don't usually get strong winds around here, and the weather seemed perfectly calm before all this madness began. Is this supernatural as well?

With the window wide open, you spread your wings - it takes a few tries - and, after hesitating briefly, you jump out and are immediately swept away by the gale.

You tumble around in midair for a few seconds before managing to face the direction you're going. You're falling, but slowly. You flap frantically and manage to gain some height. That's officially flying.

It's a thrilling experience, at least until you look down and see the suburbs zooming by not too far below you. You were willing to risk falling out the window, but now you're in danger of slamming into something at high speed if you can't land well. There's no slowing down in this wind, and you dare not try to control where you're going. What to do?
14121112.title: The Fledgling

1512.content:
You wait there expectantly, holding your breath. The room looks perfectly normal, exactly as though the Triforce had never been there. Maybe you... dreamt it?

There certainly wasn't any sign of you being whisked off to Hyrule, which was a relief.

You finally let out a long breath and made to leave. A flash of red in the mirror caught your eye.

Your hair was red! Were you turning into a Gerudo?! The hair was thick and coarse. Gradually, your hairline started to creep down your forehead and the back of your neck. Very soon the red hair was covering your shoulders and working it's way over the bridge of your nose.

You were becoming Epona! Oh no!

The next change -
1512.title: Becoming Epona

15122.content:
"Oh nay, I mean Oh no!" You say as your mouth and nose begin to elongate outwards in the first stages of forming a horse's muzzle. Your spine crackles and bends, forcing your into a hunched position. Soon you'll be on all fours.

You try to find pen and paper to write a note explaining to whoever finds you why there's a horse in your room. But as you grab a pen, your fingers start to merge together into a single hoof, and you drop it.
15122.title: Why the long face?

1522.content:
Anthony felt a warmth run through his body. He bolted into the bathroom room as the warmth intensified. Suddenly, there was a flash of light and Anthony tripped over his jeans. The usually lanky teen stumbled headfirst into the bathroom. Standing up, He saw that his clothes were baggy.

"That's weird, these are new...oh..." Anthony groaned.

The changes! He was changing into a character from the game- a character who was shorter. Way shorter, apparently, then Anthony's 6'3 frame. At an approximation, Anthony guessed he was only a little taller than 5 feet- maybe 5'3.
1522.title: Why are my clothes baggy? And why is...oh...

15221.content:
To make things worse, Anthony's clothes disappeared, leaving him naked.

"This cannot get any worse..." Anthony moaned.

At that moment, making things worse, Anthony suddenly felt a whoosh of air, and he was covered in a light leather armor, with a soft silk under garment. 'Silk?,' Anthony thought, 'Link didn't wear silk!' Next, a familiar green tunic materialized on Anthony's body. However, the tunic was a bit shorter than he remembered- it only went up to the middle of his thigh. It seemed a little baggy, and no hat materialized either.
15221.title: Green is the new... Girl?

choices: Anthony freaks out and begins panicking
152211.content:
Anthony felt the warmth return, and was acutely aware of some strange sensations. The warmth intensified, and many things happened at once: His vision blurred for a moment and then returned; Blond bangs obscured his eyes, and as he brushed the soft hair out of his eyes, he saw that his hand was slender, softer, and hairless. Feminine. Anthony screamed and wheeled around, facing the mirror, then screamed again. The second scream was an octave higher, meriting a third scream.

His face was that of a beautiful girl- long golden hair that reached the small of his back, wide blue eyes, looking like a- uh-oh. Looking like a girl version of Link. The warmth returned, and he felt his dick shrink in to his body, being replaced with, well something! His hips widened, and he could see in the mirror that his ass was growing- filling out!. It was a fairly large ass- not overblown, but supple.

At that time, Anthony felt some of the leather around his waist constrict, leaving him gasping for breath, but suddenly it felt totally normal. Finally, and most dreaded, he felt a rapid accumulation of the warmth in his chest. He could see his tunic, now clearly a dress, inflate before his eyes, until he had what seemed like a big pair of breasts, though in reality they were only around a C cup.

As a last insult, his ears pointed and the warmth dissipated.
152211.title: What Now?

1522112.content:
Anthony was trying to pull her pointy ears off when there was another flurry of magic, and a number of items and satchels appeared around her waist, secured firmly to the leather belt that perched on her widened hips. A wide-leather strap formed over her chest, running up between her breasts and onto her back, where she felt a solid heavy weight. It counterbalanced the strange new weight on her chest nicely. She was pretty sure she knew what it was.

She twisted in the mirror to see. Yep. There was the Master Sword, in it's sheath, attached to her back. It looked huge; she wasn't even sure if her slender form would be even able to wield it.

Wow. This was great. Not only was she a beautiful girl, she was now sporting a lethal weapon and - she ran a quick check through the satchels - yep, bombs. No way she was going to be able to explain this to her mother. Or the police.

What was she even supposed to do with all this junk?

As if in response to her thought, a ______ appeared.
1522112.title: Anthony got weapons!

15222.content:
The warmth intensified, flowing all over him. His hair grew down a little lower than his shoulders, and then turned blond. His hips widened, then his butt grew tighter. His arms and legs became slimmer, and his manhood turned into...well, womanhood (if that is even a term, but you get my point). Finally, his chest inflated into B cup size boobs. He was a female version of Link!

"Oh my GOD CAN THIS GET ANY WORSE?!?!?" He, or rather SHE screamed out. "Holy-" She gasped in surprise. Her voice was an octave higher, and sounded like Link's, only female.

She had no idea that YES, it could, and would get worse.

152221.content:
Suddenly, her clothes felt weird. Like if...

"Ohmygodwheredidmyclothesgo?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!" She said rapidly.

New clothes began to form. A perfectly fitted pair of underpants and something that acted like a sports bra came first. Next, a familiar green tunic appeared. Then, instead of pants, a short matching green skirt materialized. After that, the pointed hat appeared. Finally, the bow, quiver, leather armor, and other miscellaneous details formed. And to add insult to injury, her ears became pointed. She fingered her new clothes and body, then realized something weird was going on. The light was getting dimmer, and everything was getting hazy. What was going on?
152221.title: Her clothes change

1522212.content:
There was a disorienting lurching sensation. Anthony's new, long-blond hair whipped about her as the world around her seemed to get sucked away. There was a second of blackness and then -

A woodland. The sun peeked warmly through the treetops. The turf beneath her boots was soft and spongy. A pleasant breeze whistled through the trees, ruffling the hem of her tunic and tickling over her skin. Everything was so sensitive in this girl's body, and the world around her was so vivid and inviting that Anthony momentarily felt almost taken-in by the experience. She mentally checked herself, and pulled desperately on the hem of the tunic, wishing the wish hadn't given her one quite so short.

"This is defying about ten laws of physics, y'know." She yelled to the unnatural quiet of the wood around her.
1522212.title: Anthony is sucked into the game world.

choices: "We need to see the Great Deku Tree!" (OoT Again?)
15222121.content:
Anthony blinked upon hearing a high-pitched voice. A ball of light with a pair of wings were approaching, and she tilted her head.

"... Navi?"

The fairy bounced about before gently tugging on her tunic... Somehow. Life started gently going around- Insects, birds, and various other creatures. She had to be in a familiar set of woods, but what could that mean? Would it result in essentially replaying one of the games? It'd be fun... If she wasn't actually the one in danger, although it would be a bit amusing to see just how many girls would still be attracted to the child of the forest... Before recalling the men. Including some rather unpleasant ones. She shivered before gulping as she started moving in the direction the fairy was tugging.

"Uh.. Hey... I know this is probably going to sound weird and all... Where is this? And where are we going?"

The ball of light stopped and spoke in a relatively clear voice.

"This is the Lost Woods inside Kokiri Forest! As for where we're going..."
15222121.title: A fairy.

Suddenly you were garbed in a familiar green outfit. A green tunic, knee-high green boots - you were turning into Link! Well, that wasn't so bad. Though you didn't remember Link ever wearing a darker-green, long-sleeved shirt under his tunic, or wearing green boots instead of brown. And where was his trademark hat? All that he had on your head was a... hairband?

You remembered Saria, the little forest sage, wearing a hairband. You were going to turn into a girl. You groaned.

"Why the heck couldn't I have wished for a million dollars!?"
1531.title: Million pounds > Saria

15331.content:
He looked down at his watch. Terror struck his face when he had five minutes to be in class. 'Oh, no! If I'm late Mr. Martin's class, it's detention for sure!'

He sprinted into the classroom mere seconds before the bell rang.

"Hey! Nice of you to show up." It was Lauren, Anthony's best friend. She had a very slight build, and pale skin from never leaving the comforts of the indoors for longer then she had to. "By the way, love the new dew! That green totally matches your eyes."

Anthony stared at her, trying to decipher what she had said. "I didn't die my hair! It's black."

"Oh really?" She pulled a compact mirror out of her purse. "See?" In the mirror was the familiar site of his own face, but now framed by a mop of forest green hair.

"Anthony! You know the rules, no unnatural hair colors! I will give you till next week to change it." The teacher said as he walked in.
15331.title: hair

1541.content:
You scratch your head, wondering what just happened. The Triforce is gone now, seemingly vanished.

"Will the wish come true, or was it all in my imagination?" You cannot help but wonder, but you figure you might as well just go eat breakfast and not worry about it.

You try walking, but you trip and fall. You stand back up, looking down to see what could've caused you to fall. You're wearing boots... that's strange, you were just wearing your regular shoes before... but now boots? They seem like... cowboy boots, only... much more feminine.

'This is just bizarre. You think as you take the boots off and look for some other shoes in the closet.

You are surprisingly met by more boots. Not only that, but the shirts and pants you're used to finding aren't there, replaced by pink dresses and white shirts. Weird, but not as weird as when you look back down at yourself.

The t-shirt and pants you had on are gone, replaced by a dress and white shirt... and you're wearing a yellow scarf, it looks like. You look at the pendant holding the scarf together, and it's... Bowser?

"Wait a minute, Malon had a Bowser pendant in Ocarina of Time." You think out loud. "Of course, the Triforce! It's granting my wish! But why does it have to be a girl?! You sit on your bed to try to calm down.
1541.title: Clothing

15533221.content:
Just as you reach out to this glowing ball that "was" a Triforce, it transfigures before you can touch it. Instead of the lovely creation of the Three Goddesses, you now see before you the malicious evil... Majora's Mask!! A little scared, you try to jump back onto your bed. Except now, you tumble to the ground, stunned! You're in a pitch black room, and the Mask isn't far from your face. Swirling colors start to surround you, and you realize that the Mask is casting a spell over you, much like in the beginning of the game!

In hurry, you realize there's a way to completely change the outcome. Without hesitation, you grab the floating Mask out of the air, and slip it over your face! A loud wailing shakes the ground surrounding you, and the colors flurry around your face. You keep your eyes shut, however, and merely let the changes wash over you. After all, you did wish to become someone from the Legend of Zelda series...

At last, the ground ceases quaking and the colors have all disappeared. You stir and awaken to see the world from a different point of view, one that's a lot shorter than your normal one. You notice the same black room when you open your eyes, but there's a pool of water in it! Quickly you run over towards it, desperate to see what you have become! And, to your slight dismay, you've transformed into the mask-wearing Skull Kid! However, some things remained the same. You're still wearing your red T-shirt, only it's adorned with the Skull Kid's straw-like embellishments. Out of the corner of your eye, you spot two glowing orbs. The fairies that follow you. Oddly enough, they are not the same as from the game.

One of them calls himself "Daniel", the other (a girl), "Danielle". You vaguely seem to remember someone named Daniel, or was it Danielle? Regardless, you believe that these two are in fact one, a person in your real life. You want to ask them what's going on, but just as suddenly they slip away from you. They're waiting on the sides of a blinding white opening, and you head straight on through the door!
15533221.title: Skull Kid!

info.brief_description: One day, you find what looks like the Triforce...
info.description:
Your name is Anthony, one day you find what looks like the Triforce, which gives you a wish.

Rules:

No gay/lesbian stuff or incest.

Keep any names of characters the same throughout the story.

No killing off Anthony or ending the story.

No turning Anthony evil or changing his personality.

Anthony can't lose his memories, that would defeat the point of having it be him.

Use proper grammar and spelling.

If I find out that someone who adds has stolen someone else's chapter, and then posted it as their own, then I'll delete it.

There may be other things I'm forgetting, so everything else is fair game unless I remember anything else and add it.

Anthony's personality: A lone-wolf, but not a mean person and is very stubborn. Will always be there for his friends if he can; become his enemy and you will have a hard time. He is not a lone-wolf towards his friends.

Anthony's appearance (at first): Tall, with dark brown hair and dark brown eyes. Wears dark blue jeans or shorts, black shoes, with the shirts he wears being either completely dark blue, completely yellow, completely red, very dark blue with the word Nintendo writen on the front, or black with a picture of Sonic on the front.

Mr. Martin: One of Anthony's teachers.

Lauren: Anthony's best friend. She has a very slight build, and pale skin from never leaving the comforts of the indoors for longer then she has to.

Stan: The mailman.

If you create a character, then you must give the details about them, such as their appearance and personality.

I'm giving 300 gift points to anyone who adds actual chapters.
